name: Jon Courson
description:
Jon Courson ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Jon Courson in mp3 format.  Jon Courson has been teaching through the Bible for over 25 years. He has had the privilege of being the founding pastor of Applegate Christian Fellowship as well as pastoring at Calvary Chapel Costa Mesa and ministering to thousands through the Searchlight radio program and at conferences and retreats across the country. 
Pastor Jon Courson's Searchlight website contains audio and video of all of his Thru-the-Bible teachings from Genesis thru Revelation. In addition, the website has a Daily Devotional, Store, Photos, Recent Searchlight Radio programs and Podcasts.
